import React from 'react'; // import styled from "styled-components"; import "../css/style.css"; const ContactUs = () => { return (
{/* */}

Contact Us

We value your feedback, inquiries, and suggestions. Feel free to get in touch with us using the following methods:

General Inquiries

For general questions, suggestions, or collaborations, you can reach us via email at contact@vaultgeist.com.

Review Submissions

If you're an artist, label, or representative interested in having your vinyl release reviewed on Vaultgeist, please send a copy of the album to:.

Vaultgeist Reviews

    • 116 Johannes Ramokhoase Street
      Pretoria
      0002

    • Please include relevant information about the release, such as artist name, album title, genre, and release date.

    Advertising and Partnerships

    For advertising opportunities, partnerships, or sponsorships, please contact our marketing team at advertising@vaultgeist.com .

    Social Media

    You can also connect with us on social media for updates, discussions, and more:

    • - Twitter: [twitter.com/Vaultgeist](https://twitter.com/Vaultgeist)
      - Facebook: [facebook.com/Vaultgeist](https://facebook.com/Vaultgeist)
      - Instagram: [instagram.com/Vaultgeist](https://instagram.com/Vaultgeist)

    • Feedback and Suggestions

    We value your input! If you have any suggestions, comments, or feedback about our content or website, please let us know at feedback@vaultgeist.com .

    Join the Community

    Become a part of our music-loving community by subscribing to our newsletter and following us on social media. Stay updated with the latest vinyl releases, reviews, and insights.

    Thank you for being a part of Vaultgeist. We look forward to hearing from you!

     {/*     */}
    ); }; export default ContactUs;
